comment: This is generated by ESQL's AbstractFunctionTestCase. Do no edit it. See ../README.md for how to regenerate it.
name: round
description:
Rounds a number to the specified number of decimal places.
Defaults to 0, which returns the nearest integer. If the
precision is a negative number, rounds to the number of digits left
of the decimal point.

params.name: number
params.description: The numeric value to round. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: number
params.description: The numeric value to round. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: decimals
params.description: The number of decimal places to round to. Defaults to 0. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: number
params.description: The numeric value to round. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: number
params.description: The numeric value to round. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: decimals
params.description: The number of decimal places to round to. Defaults to 0. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: number
params.description: The numeric value to round. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: number
params.description: The numeric value to round. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: decimals
params.description: The number of decimal places to round to. Defaults to 0. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: number
params.description: The numeric value to round. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

examples:
FROM employees
| KEEP first_name, last_name, height
| EVAL height_ft = ROUND(height * 3.281, 1)
